name: 2Button Racer
description:
Music courtesy of Joshua McLean.

Beepbox and Audacity used for sound.

Pinta, GIMP and Tiled used for art.

Godot Engine used for development on Ubuntu.

An entry for the 2-button game jam.

Currently, there is only one level playable.  Once the game jam is finished, I'll be implementing the other two tracks and some other features.
